content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper ore smelting facility at position (62, -54)
Consists of a stone-furnace at position (62, -54), a burner-inserter at position (62.5, -55.5), and a belt at position (63.5, -53.5) and (64.5, -53.5)

### Offshore pump facility at position (107.5, -33.5)
Consists of an offshore-pump at position (107.5, -33.5) and a pipe group with multiple pipes at positions (107.5, -34.5), (109.5, -34.5), (108.5, -34.5), (109.5, -32.5), (109.5, -33.5), and (109.5, -31.5)

### Boiler facility at position (111.5, -32.0)
Consists of a boiler at position (111.5, -32.0) and multiple pipes at positions (109.5, -32.5), (109.5, -33.5), (111.5, -33.5), (113.5, -33.5), (112.5, -33.5), and (109.5, -31.5)

### Steam engine facility at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of a steam-engine at position (117.5, -30.5), multiple pipes at positions (115.5, -33.5), (117.5, -33.5), (116.5, -33.5), (117.5, -27.5), (119.5, -27.5), and (118.5, -27.5), and a small-electric-pole at position (119.5, -30.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
- Ensure the inventory is not full before attempting to insert items
### Errors when furnace belt is blocked
- Ensure the drop position of the furnace belt is not blocked before attempting to insert items
### Errors when out of fuel
- Ensure the boiler has a fuel source before attempting to use it
### Errors when no input liquid is present
- Ensure the steam engine has an input liquid before attempting to use it
### Errors when no fluid is present in connections
- Ensure the steam engine has a fluid connection before attempting to use it

### NAMESPACE
* Utility functions:
	+ insert_item: Inserts an item into an entity's inventory
	+ get_entity_status: Gets the status of an entity
	+ get_inventory: Gets the inventory of an entity
* Important variables:
	+ transport-belt: int
	+ small-electric-pole: int
	+ stone-furnace: int
	+ wood: int
	+ coal: int
	+ copper-ore: int
	+ iron-plate: int
	+ copper-plate: int
	+ copper-cable: int
	+ iron-gear-wheel: int
